meta.name: Automated Brand Mentions Tracker With GPT-4o, Google Sheets, and Email

parameters.content: Choose your timeframe. How often do you want the automation to trigger?
Set up your brand name in the JavaScript + add the queries you want to track
Sending the queries to ChatGPT. I recommend using the 'chatgpt-4o-latest' model. You need to add your API key.
This JavaScript node analyzes each response received from ChatGPT.
Connect your Google Sheets. Don't forget to enable the Google Sheets and Google Drive APIs in your Google Cloud project.
This node turns all the raw data into a nicely formated email. No need to change anything.
Finally! Replace the placeholder emails and connect yours. Using Gmail? Leave smtp.gmail.com as host.
